description: The NotifyWorkers operation sends an email to one or more Workers that you specify with the Worker ID. You can specify up to 100 Worker IDs to send the same message with a single call to the NotifyWorkers operation. The NotifyWorkers operation will send a notification email to a Worker only if you have previously approved or rejected work from the Worker.

parameters.name: Subject
parameters.description: The subject line of the email message to send. Can include up to 200 characters.

parameters.name: MessageText
parameters.description: The text of the email message to send. Can include up to 4,096 characters.

parameters.name: WorkerIds
parameters.description: A list of Worker IDs you wish to notify. You can notify upto 100 Workers at a time. (string) ---

nested_items.name: NotifyWorkersFailureStatuses
nested_items.description: When MTurk sends notifications to the list of Workers, it returns back any failures it encounters in this list of NotifyWorkersFailureStatus objects.

nested_items.name: NotifyWorkersFailureCode
nested_items.description: Encoded value for the failure type.

nested_items.name: NotifyWorkersFailureMessage
nested_items.description: A message detailing the reason the Worker could not be notified.
